Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1947...
Injured on 5/8/1948 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/25/1951 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/1952, off Wesley Roberts (NJ)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Manchester on 5/9/1957...
Drove in 6 runs against Manchester on 6/28/1957...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Northeastern on 7/19/1958...
Injured on 4/27/1959 with a Torn Hamstring Muscle, out for full season...
Won World Championship with Plum Grove in 1960...
Drove in 8 runs against Boston (FBA) on 6/1/1962...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 2/1/1965 to a 1-year deal worth $429,400 per year...
Injured on 4/30/1966 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Released by New Jersey on 7/7/1966...
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by West Texas in 1967...
Injured on 7/8/1970 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/30/1973...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/10/1973, off Hubert Herman (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/14/1973, off Chris Hale (GHG)...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1973, going 15-16, 3.46 ERA...
Injured on 8/27/1974 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1975, winning 2 games with a 0.52 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1978, going 3-1, 1.09...
Injured on 6/28/1978 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Bay City on 2/2/1979 to a 5-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1982...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1983, going 5-0, 0.51...
